artist: Designer: James H. Bowen; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
description: paddle wheel boat; 2 smoke stacks; 2 paddle wheels; pilot house; openwork windows down each side; openwork over revolving paddle wheels
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on bottom, incised: [ENG PAT JULY 22 / 1882 / US PAT AUG 8 1882]; on stopper, incised: illegible inscription
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#94-14 / Frog Bank / (2 Frogs) / 69125 250 / 4290 / #99M]
title: "Frog Bank" (or "Two Frogs") mechanical bank
